update.name: sentiment_json
update.description: A JSON with a 'label' field indicating the sentiment: Delighted, Happy, Neutral, Unhappy, Frustrated

update.name: actual_close_date
update.description: The actual close date of the ticket. Example: 2024-09-24T09:04:59.438Z

update.name: surveys_aggregation_json
update.description: A JSON array with each element having an 'average' field denoting the CSAT score (between 1-5) of a survey response

update.name: created_date
update.description: The date when the ticket was created. Example: 2024-09-24T09:04:59.438Z

update.name: stage_json
update.description: A JSON with a 'name' field indicating the stage of the ticket. Example: queued, awaiting_development

update.name: rev_oid
update.description: The ID of the rev org object (customer) to which this ticket belongs to

update.name: modified_by_id
update.description: The ID of the user who last modified the ticket

update.name: created_by_id
update.description: The ID of the user who created the ticket

update.name: applies_to_part_id
update.description: The ID of the part object to which this ticket belongs to

update.name: group
update.description: The ID of the group object of dev users to which this ticket belongs to

update.name: target_close_date
update.description: The target close date of the ticket. Example: 2024-09-24T09:04:59.438Z

update.name: owned_by_ids
update.description: The list of IDs of the users who own the ticket

update.name: severity
update.description: The severity of the ticket denoted by an integer value where: 5->blocker, 6->high, 7->medium, 8->low

update.name: reported_by_ids
update.description: The list of IDs of the users who reported the ticket

update.name: modified_date
update.description: The date when the ticket was last modified. Example: 2024-09-24T09:04:59.438Z

update.name: id
update.description: The unique ID of the ticket object
